title.rendered: Free Freelance Essentials Course: Your Complete Guide from Contracts to Taxes

content.rendered:
Going freelance is an exciting change… When you’re your own boss, all your work becomes an investment in yourself, and you have the freedom to work from anywhere, anytime.
But it can be a tough transition.
There’s so much to learn when you first take the leap. You suddenly need to be an expert not only in your craft, but in invoicing, taxes, creating proposals, and even setting up legally binding contracts.
Never fear – Fiverr Workspace is here to help.
Our amazing head of support Oliver has put together a Skillshare course that will take you through a step-by-step guide to the logistics of freelancing. And it’s free to join!
This course is packed full of valuable information for those who are thinking about going freelance and experienced freelancers alike.
Oliver covers:

  • Choosing your business entity and picking a name
  • Writing legally binding contracts
  • Putting proposals together
  • How (and when) to find professional help
  • Pricing your work & getting paid
  • Understanding expenses and write-offs
  • Paying your taxes

Every lesson is packed with facts, resources, and expertise to help you run the behind-the-scenes part of your business, so you have more time to focus on the work you love.
Head over to skl.sh/ANDCO to sign up.
